Package io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging

This package contains all classes necessary for the logging bolt, a simple implementation of a bolt which only logs the contents of tuples that it receives.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LoggingBolt
    This simple logging bolt simple logs the contents of a tuple before sending it on its way.

Package io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging Description

This package contains all classes necessary for the logging bolt, a simple implementation of a bolt which only logs the contents of tuples that it receives.
Author:
Michael Krotscheck
